solution_line_template: The cost will for {num_adults} adults will be ${adult_ticket_price}/adult x {num_adults} adults = $<<{adult_ticket_price}*{num_adults}={adult_total}>>{adult_total}
The cost for {num_children} children will be ${child_ticket_price}/child x {num_children} children = $<<{child_ticket_price}*{num_children}={child_total}>>{child_total}
